org.kaazing.k3po.junit.rules

Class K3poRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.junit.rules.Verifier
      • org.kaazing.k3po.junit.rules.K3poRule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.junit.rules.TestRule

    public class K3poRule
extends org.junit.rules.Verifier
    A K3poRule specifies how a Test using k3po is executed.

      K3poRule()
      Allocates a new K3poRule.

    • Method Detail

      • setScriptRoot

        public K3poRule setScriptRoot(String scriptRoot)
        Sets the ClassPath root of where to look for scripts when resolving them.
        Parameters:
        scriptRoot - is a directory/package name of where to resolve scripts from.
        Returns:
        an instance of K3poRule for convenience

      • setControlURI

        public K3poRule setControlURI(URI controlURI)
        Sets the URI on which to communicate to the k3po driver.
        Parameters:
        controlURI - the URI on which to connect
        Returns:
        an instance of K3poRule for convenience

      • apply

        public org.junit.runners.model.Statement apply(org.junit.runners.model.Statement statement,
                                      org.junit.runner.Description description)
        Specified by:
        apply in interface org.junit.rules.TestRule
        Overrides:
        apply in class org.junit.rules.Verifier

      • start

        public void start()
        Starts the connects in the robot scripts. The accepts are implicitly started just prior to the test logic in the Specification.

      • finish

        public void finish()
            throws Exception
        Blocking call to await for the K3po threads to stop executing. If the connects have not already been initiated via the start() method, they will be implicitly called.
        Throws:
        Exception - if an error has occurred in the execution of the tests.
